nodes.text: An artifact created by the Sith Lord Tulak Hord was one of a set of five Sith artifacts that he used to conquer the Dromund system. The artifact eventually fell into the possession of House Organa from Alderaan and was stored in their private vault on Elysium. In 3643 BBY the the apprentice of Darth Zash recovered the arifact, and Zash later combined it with four other artifacts to perform the Transfer essence ritual in the Dark Temple on Dromund Kaas.
Tulak Hord's artifact on Alderaan appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Sith Inquisitor class mission.
